snippet: The government's lawsuit against Standard & Poor's over credit ratings suggests that we may see fewer settlements and more court cases involving financial institutions in the future.
abstract: The government's lawsuit against Standard & Poor's over credit ratings suggests that we may see fewer settlements and more court cases involving financial institutions in the future.

headline.main: S.&P. Lawsuit Draws New Line in the Sand
